section.title: Updating to the new Web Tools Platform packages
section.para: In order to receive the updated Web Tools Platform packages for the JBoss Developer Studio 3.0.1 () the following location needs to be added or enabled as part of the update process: http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/updates/. From this location install the two patches that appear under the Patches menu and labeled as Patches 2010 04 13.

mediaobject.caption: Selecting the Web Tools Platform patches from the update site

important.para: You can only use the update method if the JBoss Developer Studio 3.0 is currently installed.
If the JBoss Developer Studio 3.0.1 will be a new installation, the Web Tools Platform patches are included with the install and no extra update or patches are necessary.
